subfields.name: driver
subfields.label: Driver
subfields.helptext: Driver is the name of driver to use for this volume.

subfields.name: fsType
subfields.label: Filesystem Type
subfields.helptext: The type of the filesystem, eg: 'ext4', 'xfs', 'ntfs'

subfields.name: secretRef
subfields.label: Secret Reference
subfields.helptext: Optional: SecretRef is reference to the secret object containing sensitive information to pass to the plugin scripts. This may be empty if no secret object is specified. If the secret object contains more than one secret, all secrets are passed to the plugin scripts.

subfields.name: name
subfields.label: Name of secret
subfields.helptext: The name of the kubernetes secret.

subfields.name: readOnly
subfields.label: Read Only
subfields.helptext: Enabling it will force the ReadOnly property in VolumeMounts.
